conversations.body_text: Hi John Kelly,    We apologize for the out-of-stock situation at our US warehouse. We are urgently arranging an air shipment to restock, and expect to ship your order by next Friday.

There was no notification telling me you were out of stock, I’d like a
refund. That is ridiculous

On Wed, Jan 14, 2026 at 9:03 PM service@simsonn.com

Please let me know when you have issued the refund. My pedals broke and I
needed a new set quickly.
I would like a refund and cancel my order

Hi John Kelly,       We apologize for the inconvenience. The Pro X pedals are currently out of stock at our US warehouse. We have urgently arranged an air shipment and expect to ship your order on the 22nd, with delivery estimated around the 25th.

I was never told about your lack of inventory, I would like either a refund
or overnight shipping

On Sat, Jan 17, 2026 at 3:56 AM service@simsonn.com
